mapper.select: SELECT /* ThemeThemeZoneMapper.XML, selectThemeThemeZoneInfo, SAC 전시, 2014-02-21 */ A.BNR_MENU_NM , A.BNR_MENU_ID , A.BNR_NM FROM ( SELECT TDL.LIST_NM AS BNR_MENU_NM ,TDL.LIST_ID AS BNR_MENU_ID , TDL.LIST_NM AS BNR_NM FROM TB_DP_LIST TDL WHERE TDL.LIST_ID = #{themeZoneId} UNION ALL SELECT ( SELECT TCM.CD_NM FROM TB_CM_CD TCM where TCM.CD_ID = TDB.BNR_MENU_ID) AS BNR_MENU_NM , TDB.BNR_MENU_ID , TDBE.BNR_NM FROM TB_DP_BNR TDB , TB_DP_BNR_EXPO TDBE WHERE 1=1 AND TDB.BNR_INFO = #{themeZoneId} AND TDB.BNR_MENU_ID = TDBE.BNR_MENU_ID AND TDB.BNR_SEQ = TDBE.BNR_SEQ ) A

SELECT /* ThemeThemeZoneMapper.XML, ThemeThemeZoneDevice, SAC 전시, 2014-04-01 */ F.EBOOK_SPRT_YN, F.MAGAZINE_SPRT_YN, F.COMIC_SPRT_YN, F.MUSIC_SPRT_YN, F.HDV_SPRT_YN, F.VIDEO_DRM_SPRT_YN FROM TB_CM_DEVICE F WHERE DEVICE_MODEL_CD = #{deviceModelCd} AND F.USE_YN = 'Y'

SELECT /* ThemeThemeZoneMapper.XML, selectThemeThemeZone, SAC 전시, 2014-03-24 */ BB.LIST_ID , BB.LIST_NM , BB.IMG_PATH , BB.TOTAL_COUNT FROM ( SELECT AA.LIST_ID , AA.LIST_NM , AA.IMG_PATH , COUNT(AA.LIST_ID) OVER () AS TOTAL_COUNT , ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY AA.EXPO_ORD, AA.EXPO_ORD_SUB) AS RNUM FROM ( SELECT TDL.LIST_ID , TDL.LIST_NM , TDL.IMG_PATH , TDL.EXPO_ORD , TDL.EXPO_ORD_SUB , ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY TDL.LIST_ID ORDER BY TDL.LIST_ID ) AS RN FROM TB_DP_LIST TDL WHERE TDL.LIST_ID LIKE 'TAR%' AND TDL.TENANT_ID = #{tenantId} AND TDL.EXPO_YN = 'Y' AND EXISTS ( SELECT /*+ USE_NL(G) USE_NL(D) */ 1 FROM TB_DP_LIST_PROD TDLP , TB_DP_PROD_RSHP A , TB_DP_MENU_CATEGORY_PROD_MAPG B , TB_DP_MENU_CATEGORY C , TB_DP_PROD D , TB_DP_TENANT_PROD E , TB_DP_SPRT_DEVICE F , TB_DP_TENANT_PROD G WHERE TDL.LIST_ID = TDLP.LIST_ID AND SYSDATE BETWEEN TDLP.EXPO_START_DT AND TDLP.EXPO_END_DT AND TDLP.TENANT_ID = #{tenantId} AND E.TENANT_ID = #{tenantId} AND G.TENANT_ID = #{tenantId} AND TDLP.EXPO_YN = 'Y' AND TDLP.PROD_ID = A.PROD_ID AND A.PART_PROD_ID = D.PROD_ID AND A.PROD_RSHP_CD = 'DP010802' AND E.PROD_STATUS_CD = 'PD000403' AND A.PROD_ID = G.PROD_ID AND G.PROD_STATUS_CD = 'PD000403' AND A.PROD_ID = B.PROD_ID AND B.USE_YN = 'Y' AND B.MENU_ID = C.MENU_ID AND C.USE_YN = 'Y' AND D.PROD_ID = E.PROD_ID AND (F.DEVICE_MODEL_CD = #{deviceModelCd} OR F.DEVICE_MODEL_CD = #{anyDeviceModelCd}) AND A.PART_PROD_ID = F.PROD_ID AND (CASE WHEN D.TOP_MENU_ID = 'DP13' THEN CASE WHEN #{ebookSprtYn} = 'Y' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END WHEN D.TOP_MENU_ID = 'DP14' THEN CASE WHEN #{comicSprtYn} = 'Y' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END WHEN D.TOP_MENU_ID = 'DP15' THEN 0 WHEN D.TOP_MENU_ID = 'DP16' THEN CASE WHEN D.META_CLSF_CD = 'CT25' THEN CASE WHEN #{musicSprtYn} = 'Y' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ELSE 1 END WHEN D.TOP_MENU_ID IN ('DP17', 'DP18') THEN CASE WHEN NVL(D.DRM_YN, 'N') = 'Y' AND #{videoDrmSprtYn} = 'N' THEN 0 ELSE CASE WHEN #{sdVideoSprtYn} = 'Y' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END END ELSE 1 END) = 1 ) UNION ALL SELECT TDL.LIST_ID , TDL.LIST_NM , TDL.IMG_PATH , TDL.EXPO_ORD , TDL.EXPO_ORD_SUB , ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY TDL.LIST_ID ORDER BY TDL.LIST_ID DESC) AS RN FROM TB_DP_LIST TDL WHERE TDL.LIST_ID LIKE 'TAR%' AND TDL.TENANT_ID = #{tenantId} AND TDL.EXPO_YN = 'Y' AND EXISTS ( SELECT /*+ LEADING(TDLP B) USE_NL(D) */ 1 FROM TB_DP_LIST_PROD TDLP ,TB_DP_PROD_RSHP C ,TB_DP_SHPG_CATALOG D /* 쇼핑 카탈로그 */ ,TB_DP_PROD_CATALOG_MAPG E /* 카탈로그-상품 매핑 */ ,TB_DP_MENU_SHPG_MAPG ESM ,TB_DP_PROD F ,TB_DP_TENANT_PROD G ,TB_DP_SHPG_PROD H ,TB_DP_MENU_CATEGORY I ,TB_DP_TENANT_PROD_PRICE J WHERE TDL.LIST_ID = TDLP.LIST_ID AND TDLP.TENANT_ID = #{tenantId} AND G.TENANT_ID = #{tenantId} AND J.TENANT_ID = #{tenantId} AND TDLP.EXPO_YN = 'Y' AND SYSDATE BETWEEN TDLP.EXPO_START_DT AND TDLP.EXPO_END_DT AND C.PROD_RSHP_CD = 'DP010802' AND TDLP.PROD_ID = D.CATALOG_ID AND D.CATALOG_ID = E.CATALOG_ID AND C.PROD_ID = E.PROD_ID AND C.PROD_ID <> C.PART_PROD_ID AND C.PART_PROD_ID = H.PROD_ID AND D.CATALOG_ID = ESM.CATALOG_ID AND ESM.MENU_ID = I.MENU_ID AND E.BASE_YN = 'Y' AND E.USE_YN = 'Y' AND I.USE_YN = 'Y' AND ESM.BASE_YN = 'Y' AND ESM.USE_YN = 'Y' AND H.PROD_ID = F.PROD_ID AND H.PROD_ID = G.PROD_ID AND H.PROD_ID = J.PROD_ID AND G.EXPO_YN = 'Y' AND G.PROD_STATUS_CD = 'PD000403' AND NVL(D.CHNL_CNT, 0) > 0 AND G.EXPO_YN = 'Y' AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM TB_DP_SPRT_DEVICE DV ,TB_CM_DEVICE CM WHERE 1=1 AND DV.DEVICE_MODEL_CD = CM.DEVICE_MODEL_CD AND CM.SCL_SHPG_SPRT_YN = 'Y' /*쇼핑 상품 단말 지원 여부*/ AND (DV.DEVICE_MODEL_CD = #{deviceModelCd} OR DV.DEVICE_MODEL_CD = #{anyDeviceModelCd}) AND DV.PROD_ID = F.PROD_ID ) ) ) AA WHERE RN = 1 ) BB WHERE RNUM BETWEEN #{offset} AND #{count}
